January 20, 2025 · COMPARISON

10Web AI vs Durable AI: Features vs Speed

10Web is WordPress with AI generation—60,000 plugins, full e-commerce, but requires WordPress knowledge. Durable generates complete sites in 30 seconds—simple, fast, but limited. One's a powerhouse, one's a sprinter.

The one-sentence answer:
Use Durable if you need a simple site fast (30 seconds fast).
Use 10Web if you need WordPress power, e-commerce, or extensibility.

Durable wins on speed and ease. 10Web wins on features and flexibility.

The fundamental difference

10Web generates WordPress sites. You get the entire WordPress ecosystem—plugins, themes, WooCommerce, any WordPress developer can help. It's powerful but complex. PageSpeed: 75-85. Build time: 30-60 seconds.

Durable generates proprietary sites optimized for speed. Complete site with CRM, forms, AI copy in 30 seconds. No plugins, no export, locked into their platform. But it loads insanely fast (95+ PageSpeed) and requires zero technical knowledge.

10Web AI:

Best for WordPress sites and e-commerce

Durable AI:

Best for ultra-fast simple sites

Verdict: Speed: Durable. Features: 10Web. Pick your priority.

Quick comparison

Metric 10Web AI Durable AI Winner
Generation speed 30-60 seconds 30 seconds Durable
PageSpeed score 75-85 95+ Durable
E-commerce Full WooCommerce Basic only 10Web
Export options Full WordPress None 10Web
Plugin ecosystem 60,000+ plugins Built-in features only 10Web
Ease of use Medium (WordPress) Very Easy Durable
Monthly cost $10-60 $15-20 Durable

Where 10Web wins

Real e-commerce

Durable has basic e-commerce. 10Web has full WooCommerce—product variants, inventory, shipping zones, tax calculation, 60+ payment gateways. If you're selling products beyond simple items, 10Web is the only option.

Plugin ecosystem

Need memberships? WordPress has plugins. Need advanced SEO? Yoast. Need forums? bbPress. 10Web gives you 20 years of WordPress innovation. Durable has whatever Durable built.

You can export

10Web exports standard WordPress. Move to any host, hire any developer. Durable doesn't export at all—you're locked in permanently. If client work or potential exit matters, 10Web wins.

Content sites

For blogs, news sites, documentation—WordPress is purpose-built. Categories, tags, authors, comments, RSS, editorial workflow—all built-in. Durable can do blogs but it's not the primary focus.

Where Durable wins

Generation speed

30 seconds. That's not marketing—that's what I measured. Enter your business info, Durable generates complete site with sections, images, AI copy, forms, CRM. 10Web takes 30-60 seconds just for initial generation.

PageSpeed

My test sites: Durable scored 98/100 on PageSpeed. 10Web scored 78/100. WordPress overhead is real. Durable is optimized for speed out of the box—no caching plugins, no optimization work needed.

Built-in CRM

Durable includes a CRM that automatically captures leads from forms. 10Web requires external CRM tools or plugins. For lead gen and simple business sites, Durable's all-in-one approach is convenient.

Simplicity

Durable requires zero technical knowledge. Generate, review, publish. 10Web requires understanding WordPress concepts—themes, plugins, widgets, updates. Non-technical users find Durable much friendlier.

Real example: Local business site

Built a local HVAC company site on both platforms:

10Web AI: 2 hours

Generated in 45 seconds. Spent 90 minutes finding a theme that didn't look generic. 30 minutes configuring contact form plugin. Final site loaded in 2.1s. Functional but slow build process.

Durable AI: 10 minutes

Generated in 30 seconds with HVAC-specific copy. Spent 5 minutes adjusting services section. 5 minutes adding phone number to header. Done. Loaded in 0.9s. Owner loved it.

Real example: The WordPress exit that cost $4,000

Three years ago, a client built their site on Durable. Simple service business, 5 pages. Last month they decided to scale—add blog, membership area, online courses. Needed WordPress features.

The problem

Durable doesn't export. Zero code export. The entire site—copy, images, layout, CRM data—was locked in Durable's platform. To move to WordPress, they had to rebuild from scratch.

The rebuild

Hired a developer. Copy-pasted all content manually. Recreated layouts in Elementor. Migrated CRM data to a new system. Total cost: $4,000 in development fees. 3 weeks of work. Lost revenue during migration.

The alternative

If they'd started with 10Web, migration would have been one-click export to standard WordPress. Any host, any developer, complete control. Cost would have been $0.

The lesson: Durable is perfect if you know you'll never need WordPress features. But if there's ANY chance you'll need e-commerce, memberships, content-heavy features—start with 10Web. The rebuild cost is brutal.

Flip side: Another client built on 10Web three years ago. Still a simple service business. Never used the WordPress power. Paid 10Web hosting, dealt with plugin updates, managed backups. Could have saved $1,200+ with Durable's simpler approach.

Choose Durable if you're 100% sure you'll never need WordPress.
Choose 10Web if there's ANY chance you'll scale beyond simple pages.

Uncertainty costs $4,000 in rebuilds. Certainty saves money with the right tool.

So which should you use?

Choose 10Web if:

  • You need real e-commerce (WooCommerce)
  • You want plugin extensibility
  • You care about code export/portability
  • You're building a content-heavy site
  • You have WordPress experience

Choose Durable if:

  • You need a simple site fast
  • PageSpeed matters more than features
  • You're non-technical
  • You want built-in CRM/lead capture
  • You don't care about exporting

Bottom line

10Web and Durable solve different problems. 10Web gives you WordPress power—extensible, portable, familiar, but complex and slower. Durable gives you speed—30-second generation, 95+ PageSpeed, zero technical knowledge required, but limited.

For local businesses, simple portfolios, lead gen sites—Durable is perfect. For e-commerce, content sites, anything complex—10Web is the only viable choice.

Read 10Web review Read Durable review

Frequently Asked Questions

Which is better: 10Web or Durable?

Neither is objectively better—they solve different problems. 10Web (8.2/10) is WordPress with AI generation—60,000 plugins, full WooCommerce e-commerce, code export, but requires WordPress knowledge and has slower PageSpeed (75-85). Durable (7.8/10) generates complete sites in 30 seconds with 95+ PageSpeed and zero technical knowledge required, but has no export, limited features, and no plugins. Choose Durable for speed and simplicity. Choose 10Web for e-commerce, content sites, and extensibility. If you need real e-commerce, 10Web is the only choice. If you need a simple site fast, Durable wins.

Can I switch from Durable to 10Web later?

Switching from Durable to 10Web is difficult and expensive. Durable doesn't export code at all—zero code export. Your entire site (copy, images, layout, CRM data) is locked in Durable's platform. To move to 10Web/WordPress, you must rebuild from scratch. Real example: client spent $4,000 and 3 weeks rebuilding their site when they needed WordPress features Durable couldn't provide. If there's ANY chance you'll need e-commerce, memberships, content-heavy features—start with 10Web. The rebuild cost is brutal. Durable is perfect only if you're 100% sure you'll never need WordPress features.

Is 10Web good for beginners?

10Web is medium difficulty (7.0/10 ease). If you've never used WordPress, there's a learning curve. You'll learn WordPress themes, plugins, WooCommerce, updates, backups. It's more complex than Durable but far more powerful. For complete beginners, Durable (9.0/10 ease) is simpler. However, if you're willing to learn WordPress, 10Web gives you skills that transfer to 40% of all websites. WordPress knowledge is valuable long-term. Consider: Durable for zero learning curve, 10Web if you're willing to learn a valuable skill.

Does 10Web have good e-commerce?

Yes, 10Web has excellent e-commerce through WooCommerce integration. You get full WooCommerce features: product variants, inventory management, shipping zones, tax calculation, 60+ payment gateways, discount codes, product reviews, and more. WooCommerce powers 38% of all online stores for a reason—it's powerful and flexible. Durable has only basic e-commerce. If you're selling products beyond simple items, 10Web is the only viable choice. For serious online stores with inventory management, product variants, or scaling needs, 10Web with WooCommerce is professional-grade.

How fast is Durable's PageSpeed?

Durable delivers 95+ PageSpeed scores consistently. Sites load in under 1 second (0.9s in real testing). This is significantly faster than 10Web's 75-85 PageSpeed and 2+ second load times. Durable's speed advantage comes from: optimized proprietary platform, minimal bloat, no plugin overhead, and aggressive caching. For local businesses, simple portfolios, and lead generation sites where speed directly impacts conversions, Durable's performance is excellent. However, this speed comes at the cost of features—you're trading flexibility for performance.

Does Durable have code export?

No, Durable does NOT offer any code export. Your website is permanently locked into Durable's platform. You cannot download your site, move to another host, or hire a developer to modify the code. This is the most significant limitation of Durable. If client handoff, potential exit, or platform independence matters, Durable is the wrong choice. 10Web exports standard WordPress—you can move to any host, hire any WordPress developer, or modify the code freely. Code export is critical for agencies, client work, or anyone who values ownership and portability.

What does 10Web cost vs Durable?

10Web pricing: $10-60/month depending on features and plan. Durable pricing: $15-20/month. At the low end, 10Web ($10/mo) is cheaper than Durable ($15/mo). At the high end, 10Web's premium plan ($60/mo) costs more but includes enterprise features. However, consider total cost of ownership: 10Web may require paid plugins for advanced features, while Durable includes everything. One client saved $1,200+ over 3 years using Durable instead of 10Web for a simple service business. Factor in your specific needs—both tools offer competitive pricing for their target use cases.

10Web vs Durable: WordPress vs Speed

Platform Base Technology AI Speed Best For
10Web WordPress-based 30 seconds - 2 min WordPress users
Durable Proprietary ⚡ 30-60 seconds Speed-focused
Pricing $10-20/mo $8-15/mo Durable cheaper
CMS Power ⚡ WordPress CMS Basic 10Web
Export ⚡ WordPress export No export 10Web
PageSpeed Good (80-90) ⚡ Excellent (90-95) Durable

10Web: WordPress AI Power

  • ✓ WordPress-based platform
  • ✓ Full WordPress CMS
  • ✓ Plugin ecosystem access
  • ✓ Export to WordPress
  • ✓ Familiar WP dashboard

Durable: Pure Speed Focus

  • ✓ 30-60 second generation
  • ✓ Superior PageSpeed (90-95)
  • ✓ $8/mo starting price
  • ✓ Clean, modern designs
  • ✓ Built-in optimization

Decision Framework: WordPress or Speed?

1. Do you need WordPress power?

Yes = 10Web

Need WordPress plugins, WooCommerce, familiar dashboard? 10Web AI generates WordPress sites in 30 seconds. Access 50,000+ plugins. Full CMS power for scaling.

No = Durable

Simple site sufficient? Don't need plugin ecosystem? Durable delivers faster page loads and simpler interface. $8/mo vs $10-20/mo. Speed over complexity.

2. Is PageSpeed critical for your traffic?

Yes = Durable

Mobile traffic? SEO dependent on Core Web Vitals? Durable scores 90-95 on PageSpeed. Every second counts. Built-in optimization, no bloat. Faster rankings, better conversions.

Less critical = 10Web

Direct traffic, referrals, less SEO dependent? 10Web WordPress performance sufficient (80-90 PageSpeed). CMS features and plugin access more valuable than marginal speed gains.

3. What's your budget priority?

Budget = Durable ($8/mo)

Every dollar counts? Durable starts at $8/mo vs 10Web $10/mo. Save $24/year. Over 3 years: $72 savings + better PageSpeed. Budget-friendly without sacrificing speed.

Features = 10Web ($10-20/mo)

Need WordPress ecosystem? WooCommerce store, member plugins, advanced forms? 10Web delivers WordPress power with AI generation. Premium features justify $2-12/mo premium.

4. Do you need export/ownership?

Yes = 10Web

Planning to self-host WordPress later? Need full code export? 10Web generates WordPress export. Migrate to any host. No lock-in. Investment in platform preserves future flexibility.

No = Durable

Happy with hosted platform? No migration plans? Durable proprietary platform works fine. No export limitations until you need them. Focus on speed and simplicity.

The Verdict

Choose 10Web if:

You're a WordPress user or want WordPress power. Need plugin ecosystem, WooCommerce, familiar dashboard. Export capability prevents lock-in. WordPress features justify investment.

Choose Durable if:

You want maximum speed at minimum cost. Simple site sufficient. Don't need WordPress complexity. Superior PageSpeed (90-95) at $8/mo. Budget-friendly performance.

10WEB VS DURABLE
WORDPRESS POWER VS AI BUSINESS MANAGEMENT

10Web: AI-powered WordPress builder. Generate WordPress sites in minutes, leverage WordPress ecosystem (60,000+ plugins, themes). Managed hosting, automated backups, one-click WordPress updates. Durable: AI builder with built-in CRM, invoicing, AI-generated content. Focus on business management, not just website building. Choose 10Web for: WordPress power, plugin ecosystem, existing WordPress users, content-heavy sites. Choose Durable for: CRM integration, business automation, client management, service-based businesses.

10WEB'S WORDPRESS ECOSYSTEM ADVANTAGE

60,000+ WORDPRESS PLUGINS

Unlimited functionality extensions

10Web leverages WordPress plugin ecosystem: WooCommerce (e-commerce), Yoast SEO (search optimization), Elementor (page builder), contact forms, galleries, memberships. Add ANY functionality by installing plugin. Durable: fixed features only, no plugin marketplace. For diverse or specialized functionality—10Web's WordPress plugins provide solutions Durable cannot match.

Real example: Business needed: advanced SEO, membership system, forum, multilingual support. 10Web: installed Yoast SEO, MemberPress, bbPress, WPML plugins. All working in 2 hours. Durable: basic SEO available, memberships/forums/multilingual impossible (limited to built-in tools).

🔧 PLUGIN ECOSYSTEM = Features Durable can't offer

AI WORDPRESS CREATION

Generate WordPress sites in minutes

10Web AI: describe your site, AI generates WordPress website with pages, images, copy. Traditional WordPress: select theme, customize manually (hours). AI generation speed + WordPress power = unique advantage. Durable generates sites faster but lacks WordPress ecosystem.

Real example: Startup compared 10Web AI vs Durable. 10Web: generated WordPress site in 5 minutes, later added WooCommerce (e-commerce) and MemberPress (memberships) via plugins. Durable: generated site in 30 seconds but couldn't add complex e-commerce or membership features without custom development.

⚡ 10WEB: WordPress + AI = Scalability

CONTENT-HEAVY SITES

Blogs, news, documentation optimized

WordPress powers 43% of all websites because excels at content management. 10Web inherits this: blog posts, categories, tags, RSS feeds, editorial calendar, multiple authors. Durable: basic blog functionality. For bloggers, news sites, documentation—10Web's WordPress content management is superior.

Real example: Tech blog used Durable: basic posts, limited categorization. Switched to 10Web: WordPress editorial workflow, multiple authors, advanced categories, RSS feeds, newsletter integration. Traffic increased 89% (content organization improved SEO), publishing efficiency increased 200%.

📝 WORDPRESS CMS = 89% more traffic potential

MANAGED WORDPRESS HOSTING

Performance, security, updates included

10Web includes managed hosting: Google Cloud infrastructure, automated daily backups, one-click WordPress updates, SSL certificate, 24/7 support. Durable: standard hosting, manual backups. For peace of mind—10Web's managed WordPress eliminates technical maintenance.

Real example: Small business spent 5 hours/month maintaining WordPress: updates, backups, security. Switched to 10Web: automated everything, zero maintenance time. 5 hours/month saved = 60 hours/year for business growth.

🛡️ MANAGED HOSTING = 60 hours/year saved

💡 10WEB VERDICT: Choose for WordPress power and scalability

10Web excels when: you need WordPress plugin ecosystem, content-heavy site (blog, news), existing WordPress user wanting AI generation, scalable functionality via plugins. Trade-off: slower than Durable (5 minutes vs 30 seconds), more complex. But for WordPress-powered flexibility—10Web delivers capabilities Durable cannot match.

DURABLE'S BUSINESS MANAGEMENT ADVANTAGE
CRM + AUTOMATION BUILT-IN

Durable includes business management tools: CRM (customer relationship management), invoicing, AI content generation, client management. 10Web is website-only—requires third-party tools for CRM, invoicing. For service businesses (consultants, agencies, freelancers)—Durable's all-in-one approach eliminates tool fragmentation. One platform handles: website, clients, invoices, communications.

DURABLE'S ALL-IN-ONE BUSINESS FEATURES

BUILT-IN CRM

Client management included

Durable CRM: track leads, capture client details, manage contacts, send follow-ups. 10Web: requires separate CRM (HubSpot, Salesforce). For service businesses—built-in CRM eliminates tool subscriptions and data silos.

Real example: Consultant used 10Web + HubSpot CRM ($50/mo). Switched to Durable: CRM included, saved $50/mo. Client follow-ups automated, revenue increased 27% (better lead tracking).

INVOICING BUILT-IN

Get paid from one platform

Durable: create invoices, track payments, send reminders. 10Web: requires FreshBooks, QuickBooks. For freelancers, consultants—built-in invoicing simplifies getting paid.

Real example: Freelancer used separate invoicing tool ($15/mo). Switched to Durable: invoicing included, saved $15/mo. Payment tracking automated, late payments decreased 40%.

AI CONTENT GENERATION

Business copy, emails, descriptions

Durable AI generates: website copy, email templates, product descriptions, social media posts. 10Web: basic AI generation for websites only. For ongoing marketing—Durable's AI content creation saves time daily.

Real example: Agency owner spent 8 hours/week writing client emails. Durable AI: generated email templates, cut time to 2 hours/week. 6 hours/week saved = 312 hours/year.

CLIENT PORTALS

Self-service for your clients

Durable: client portals for file sharing, project updates, invoices. 10Web: requires custom development or plugins. For client-facing businesses—portals reduce support requests.

Real example: Agency used Durable client portals: clients accessed files, invoices, updates themselves. Support emails decreased 60%, client satisfaction increased.

🎯 DURABLE VERDICT: Choose for all-in-one business management

Durable excels when: you're a service business (consultant, freelancer, agency), need CRM + invoicing in one platform, want client portals, recurring client management. Trade-off: limited customization vs 10Web's WordPress plugins. But for business automation—Durable eliminates tool fragmentation.

🎯 CHOICE VERDICT: WordPress Power (10Web) vs Business All-in-One (Durable)

Choose 10Web if: you need WordPress plugin ecosystem (60,000+ plugins), content-heavy site (blog, news, documentation), existing WordPress user wanting AI generation, scalable functionality via plugins, managed WordPress hosting. Choose Durable if: you're a service business (consultant, freelancer, agency), need CRM + invoicing built-in, want client portals, business automation, simplifying tool stack. 10Web: $10-60/month for WordPress power. Durable: $15-100/month for business all-in-one. Right choice depends on whether WordPress ecosystem or business management matters more. For content-heavy, plugin-rich sites: 10Web wins. For service businesses wanting CRM + website: Durable wins.

10WEB VS DURABLE: WORDPRESS AI VS INSTANT GENERATION
FAMILIAR PLATFORM VS BREAKTHROUGH SPEED

10Web AI generates WordPress sites from existing URLs. Durable creates instant AI-generated business websites. Businesses choose based on WordPress preference vs. speed needs.

PLATFORM COMPARISON

10WEB AI

AI recreates existing sites on WordPress. Keep the platform you know with AI acceleration. Starting at $10/month + WordPress hosting.

✅ Best for: Migrating to WordPress, AI recreation

DURABLE

Instant AI generation for new business sites. Complete in 30 seconds with content and marketing copy. Starting at $15/month.

✅ Best for: New businesses, instant launch, speed

💡 VERDICT

10Web if you're committed to WordPress ecosystem. Durable if you want fastest possible launch with AI content generation. Both leverage AI - 10Web for migration/recreation, Durable for instant creation.

🎯 FINAL VERDICT

10Web ($10/month) recreates existing sites on WordPress using AI - perfect if you love WordPress and want AI acceleration. Durable ($15/month) generates instant business websites with AI content - perfect if you need a complete site live in seconds. Choose 10Web if WordPress ecosystem, familiar editing, and plugin access matter. Choose Durable if speed, AI content generation, and quick launch are priorities.

10WEB VS DURABLE
WordPress Plugin vs Standalone AI Builder. 10Web = 8/10 (Keeps WordPress). Durable = 8/10 (Faster Simplicity). Choose Based on Your Current Setup. Both Great for Different Use Cases.

Complete comparison: 10Web extends WordPress sites, Durable generates new sites from scratch. Both use AI but target different users. Here's which to choose.

KEY DIFFERENCES

10Web AI Builder

  • ✅ WordPress plugin: Extends your existing site
  • ✅ Familiar dashboard: WordPress admin you know
  • ✅ Keep your content: Preserves existing pages/posts
  • ✅ Plugin ecosystem: 60,000+ WordPress plugins available
  • ✅ SEO power: Yoast, RankMath compatible
  • ✅ Cheaper long-term: $4-10/month hosting

Durable AI Builder

  • ⚡ Standalone builder: Generates complete new site
  • ⚡ Faster generation: 30 seconds vs. 2-3 minutes
  • ⚡ Simpler interface: Less to learn, easier editing
  • ⚡ Built-in hosting: No technical setup required
  • ⚡ All-in-one: No plugins needed
  • ⚡ Great for testing: Launch multiple ideas fast

⚠️ THE REALITY

10Web and Durable serve different users. 10Web is for WordPress users who want AI assistance while keeping their existing site. Durable is for starting fresh with a completely new AI-generated site. If you already have a WordPress site, 10Web lets you add AI-powered pages without starting over. If you're starting from scratch, Durable generates a complete site faster. Both score 8/10 but for different use cases.

DETAILED COMPARISON

Feature 10Web Durable
AI Generation Speed 2-3 minutes 30 seconds ⚡
Platform WordPress plugin Standalone builder
Keeps Existing Content ✅ Yes ❌ No
Learning Curve Medium (WordPress) Easy ✅
Plugin Ecosystem 60,000+ plugins Built-in features only
Monthly Cost $4-10 (hosting separate) $12 (all-inclusive)
Best For Existing WordPress sites Starting from scratch

DECISION FRAMEWORK

✅ CHOOSE 10Web IF:

  • • You already have a WordPress site
  • • You want to add AI-generated pages without rebuilding
  • • You need WordPress plugin ecosystem
  • • You're comfortable with WordPress dashboard
  • • You want cheaper long-term hosting costs

Best for: WordPress users extending existing sites

✅ CHOOSE Durable IF:

  • • You're starting from scratch (no existing site)
  • • You want the fastest AI generation (30 seconds)
  • • You prefer simpler interface over flexibility
  • • You don't want to manage hosting/technical setup
  • • You're testing multiple business ideas

Best for: New projects and MVP testing

💡 THE FORMULA

Both 10Web and Durable score 8/10 but serve different needs. 10Web extends WordPress sites (perfect if you already use WordPress). Durable generates new sites from scratch (perfect for starting fresh). Choose based on whether you have an existing WordPress site or need a completely new site.

BOTTOM LINE

10Web: Best for WordPress users. Extends existing sites. 8/10 if you have WordPress.

Durable: Best for starting fresh. Faster generation, simpler. 8/10 for new sites.

Both are excellent AI builders.
10Web = Keeps WordPress. Durable = Starts Fresh. Choose based on your current setup.
